info.description: This is a sample server Petstore server.
info.title: Swagger For Service Layer

tags.name: SalesStages
tags.description: This entity enables you to manipulate 'SalesStages'. It defines sales stages and the probability of closing a deal indicated by each stage. For example, you enter stage 1 by identifying a customer as a lead (prospective customer); if you define the closing percentage of this stage as 5%, it means that you estimate 5 out of 100 leads can be converted to customers who will place orders with you.
